mapper.insert: insert into linket.user (email, password, user_name, birthdate, agreement, phone, gender, role, reg_date, withdraw_date, enabled, last_updated_date, user_company_id) values (#{email},#{password},#{userName},#{birthdate},#{agreement},#{phone},#{gender},#{role},#{regDate},#{withdrawDate}, #{enabled}, #{lastUpdatedDate}, #{companyId})
mapper.select: SELECT email, password FROM user WHERE email=#{email} AND password=#{password}
